website_summaries.verdict: Carry Jedi Master Yoda around on your back just like Luke Skywalker did on Dagobah, and the cuddly and finely detailed alien will gladly keep your belongings safe.
cons: This plush backpack is as pricy as it is adorable

customer_reviews.title: Coolest backpack I have ever owned in my entire life
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is the quite the conversation piece. Everyone likes it. PROs - Keeps beverages really cold, not sure what type of insulation it has but it has kept my drinks cold for long periods of time. It is easy to put on and the adjustable straps are nice. The hood for Yoda is functional. Priced very well. CONs - It is not very large. Fits a few things like two 24 oz beverages. I just wish it had one or two more pockets, it just has one big one. No laptops but definitely a pad or whatever. Overall - I would definitely recommend this backpack if you like starwars or just cool things in general.
customer_reviews.author: Luis S.

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use it when riding my motorcycle. It doesn't hold much, but it's nice not having a huge backpack on me to carry a water bottle and a hoagie. Plus I like to think it gives people a good laugh when I'm being a jerk passing them at unnecessary speeds. And despite being hit with high winds and dirt and bugs, he still looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: DumpsterJedi

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a jedi in training you will...
customer_reviews.text: I like the yoda backpack. I bought it so employees could wear it at work when the rise of the skywalker was released. A lot of people loved it. The only thing i noticed was no matter who wore it size wise it was hard to have yoda looking over your shoulder. The straps adjusted easily but you have to hold down one of his arms so his face will appear over your shoulder if you want to take pictures with it. Otherwise he looks like he's just hanging onto your back. Still great for any star wars fan to have.
customer_reviews.author: michael Fiorentino

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Yoda pack, but not exactly functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a funny "Seagulls, Stop it now!" routine my family was doing in a parade, and it was perfect for it. But to be honest, the straps are a little awkward and hard to adjust for get it to ride on your shoulders as it should. Also, don't expect to carry anything of substance in this guy, the pocket is rather small. Still, it's an awesome item.
customer_reviews.author: Mac-mom

customer_reviews.title: buy it here instead of disneyland!!!
customer_reviews.text: The exact same thing they have for sale at Disneyland for 1/2 the price! Bought this little guy before hand- waited for my kid to ask for it then- pulled it out! Saved myself 33 extra dollars and he LOVED IT. He got so many compliments and love toting this around the park and now that we are home all of his friends are so envious!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, but tiny storage area
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute and realistic but shouldn’t be called a backpack as there is only enough room to hold a small paperback book. Tiny storage area. The Yoda doll itself is really funny and adorable! As long as you understand the storage area is small you will love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This backback is super cute. Make sure you do your shopping to see if Amazon currently offers the lowest price. But it definitely beats Disneyland price by about $30. We use it when we go to the Disney resorts. It's not that spacious, but enough to fit wallet, hat, keys, water bottle, and an autograph book or two. And it's just cute!
customer_reviews.author: Grace J

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our trip to Disney, we got so many compliments, also seen this bag at one of the gift shops for a lot more than what I bought on here! He’s durable, soft, and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: lauren k hadley

customer_reviews.title: Compliments left and right
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for riding, it easily holds two 16-oz cans and what ever else. People pay more attention when they see a Yoda on the road. The only problem is sometimes my zipper gets stuck...but thats because I dont know how to zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Kohn

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy sewing job on strap.
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening, everyone was excited. Once it was on her back, the bottom strap, that was sewn into Yoda's hip, tore out, quite easily. The other side held for the day, but now we're home and after inspection, the remaining strap is on its way out too.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Creeps my kid out
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a toddler who's really into Yoda. It creeps him out too much to wear it, but he's glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Can't even express it
customer_reviews.text: I am so over the top excited about this it's not even funny LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!! It's seriously amazing behind belief. Great conversation starter and beyond amusing to see people's reactions to it :) Only drawback is that the zipper broke first time i used it :/ So now it is just open which can be a huge hassle. Also, the the inner lining started ripping after a month of light use. Now I have to pay for it to be fixed or purchase another one. Definitely worth the fix/ purchase but still i'd of paid more to have had a longer-lasting product
customer_reviews.author: Serena s

customer_reviews.title: Does not have the details like in the picture..
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and looked at it and immediately i saw the details are not consistent with the picture here on amazon..which im always leary of when purchasing on this site..it is a xmas gift so i dont have any other comments than its appearance..the eyes are much smalle and less pronounced as well as the ears..will inspect further after it is opened for xmas
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D. Grasham

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on and so much cheaper than the version we ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute. On the small side so you can't put lots of stuff in it, but I didn't get it for that. My husband wears it while skiing with just water bottle and snacks. Looks great on and so much cheaper than the version we saw at Disney. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lunasquid

customer_reviews.title: This is really cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as a gift. She wears it to Disneyland and everyone asks her where she got it from as the one at Disney is not as cute. She absolutely loves this little guy. He’s so cute on
customer_reviews.author: Julie Palko

customer_reviews.title: Do or do not. There is no try.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gift. Well made, soft, light weight, and a good size. Not to carry much weight, but it fits quite enough things.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Berto

customer_reviews.title: How CUTE is this concept?
customer_reviews.text: The picture does this item zero justice... It is absolutely adorable in person! I cannot wait to see the gift recipient's face when they open it and figure out exactly what it is! I saw a grownup using it as a backpack at Disney - it was definitely noticeable! Very cool item!
customer_reviews.author: RRS

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: They sell these at Disneyland for $65 so I was stoked to find it online! However, one shoulder strap was sewn on backwards so it is permanently twisted! I always wondered why it was a bit uncomfortable but I didn't notice this until the third time of wearing it. I'm sure they would have exchanged it for me, but I can easily sew it up myself. Great quality for the price, apart from the shoulder strap. He's so cute! I put sunglasses and a rainbow lei on him when I wear him to Disneyland.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: An amazing backpack, I am.
customer_reviews.text: Now I'm not even a Star Wars fanatic, but this backpack is incredible. First of all, it just looks awesome. The straps are connected to Yoda's hands and feet so when you wear it, it looks like you are carrying him training for the force. The quality is also great, and it stores much more than you would expect. For example, I never thought my 15'' MacBook Pro would fit inside...but it did! Bottom line: it looks cool, it's well made and it fits much more than most novelty backpacks. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton C.

customer_reviews.title: YODA ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Well an actual "5" is a tad high, if I'm honest I would say more like a 4.53. He is perfectly well made and really looks the part riding on your back. The only reason I cannot give him a "5" is because he is to small. Being a backpack you would expect to be able to put a few D&D manuals or a laptop. Instead after a few paperbacks, maybe a small notebook computer and wallet Yoda is full. Maybe a Yoda Fanny Pack for those who are to dignified to wear a fanny pack (And you should never wear a fanny pack)
customer_reviews.author: Darth Mitchious

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters!
customer_reviews.text: The Yoda part of the back-buddy is pretty exact from a aesthetic standpoint. However the images of the zipper pocket are deceptive. Its MUCH smaller on the inside then I thought it would be. The straps are also to big to keep Yoda up on your shoulders like the images suggest. When its sized to its smallest Yoda's head sits just below my medium/large build boyfriends shoulder blades. So I cant imagine what proportion you would need to be for this to actually sit where it should... That said, its still really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Prefect042

customer_reviews.title: Lisa's Dad
customer_reviews.text: The whole family has been fans of Starwars forever and we even named our black pug "Yoda". He was a constant companion for my 24 y/o daughter. He had to be put down last November so I have been trying to find something "thoughtful" to remember him by. I have been looking at this backpack for a while before I bought it. I read almost every review and feedback and decided this was it. It is everything people describe it to be. It seems very durable, definitely cute but does have a small storage pack. It's quite realistic and I would recommend it to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Glen L. Gierke

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My teenaged daughter found this and fell in love. She wanted it enough to actually do extra work to pay for it! She uses it as a purse/backpack/overnight bag. She says it holds more than she expected and is very happy with it. I get tickled at the reactions we get while walking down the street. People smile, point and even approach us to ask about Yoda and compliment my daughter on the backpack. Well worth the price if just for my daughter's pleasure alone.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Jean Brewer

customer_reviews.title: This was the best price for this small backpack
customer_reviews.text: I collect all things Yoda. This was the best price for this small backpack. Very small. I'm a teacher and use it to carry my pens, pencils and other small daily needs. I didn't buy it for size or huge functionality, I bought it because it is so darn adorable!
customer_reviews.author: kate55

customer_reviews.title: its a backpack, and you look like Luke Skywalker Jedi training.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold much stuff, but that's not really the point, is it?
customer_reviews.author: T. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! So happy I found this for my kids bday, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: pezgirl

customer_reviews.title: I love it, as does everyone else!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Inside of the pocket is very soft and holds the amount you'd expect a backpack like this to hold. I've already gotten multiple comments on it, and kids wave to me about it when I'm on my motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: McBronzeGod

customer_reviews.title: I love my Yoda backpack
customer_reviews.text: I order my Yoda backpack on Saturday, June 15th and arrive on Tuesday, June 18th in perfect condition. The backpack itself is so cool for a big Star Wars fan like myself. Also the backpack pouch is deep so you could put a couple of your favorite things in. I just love my Yoda backpack so much!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Bettes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, it is
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold much but I didn't buy it because of storage, I bought it for how awesome and adorable it is. It is hanging on the door in my room and has startled me a couple times when I have closed it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mara Piel

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE GREATEST THING I HAVE EVER PURCHASED
customer_reviews.text: i am so glad that I bought this. It's funny, useful, and again funny. I love sitting him in my passenger seat, scaring the s*** out of lots of people. If you are thinking about buying it, f***ing do it.
customer_reviews.author: Trist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father a year after a trip we took to Disneyland. He saw it there wanted to buy it but my mother wouldn't let him. He absolutely loves it and takes it to the drag races when he is racing. It looks exactly like the ones at Disneyland.
customer_reviews.author: Game loving couple

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious gift!
customer_reviews.text: It's small but awesome! Favorite Christmas present of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Downing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like is the material is scratching on skin. I would recommend using a softer material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fun gift for a Stat Wars lover. He likes it a lot and has it set-up for display rather than using it. Quality of the product is so-so; for the price I payed I think it is under the quality it should have. But it is fun and looks funny to wear, and most of all it is cool to have Yoda riding on your back, so I think it is a worthwhile purchase for someone who likes Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. Looks like the one sold at Disney Parks
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It doesn't have much storage capacity but I didn't expect it to. It's Yoda, not a hiking backpack. Great quality. Looks great. Can't complain at all.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than the Disneyland one.I actually bought this while I was at Disneyland looking at the original. I have no regrets
customer_reviews.author: Brett A. Schweizer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.text: IF THIS ISN'T THE EXACT SAME ONE THEY SELL AT DISNEYLAND, THEN I WILL EAT A BUG. THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT. AT A REALLY GOOD PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, my daughter loves it, and it's of a decent size to hold knick-knacks such as sunglasses, pens, a small notepad, gum, or phone. Plus the price is much better than at Disneyland.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love the price my husband like it alot good Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: Alma G.

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold very much, but since it was more of a gag gift, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Funny backpack. Would be better with a sternum strap
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses this as a diaper backpack when he takes our boys out.gets laughs and compliments all d time. Originally bought this for my 2 yr old. Staps r too long for him though. Difficult to keep yoda on without sternum strap. Ordered sternum strap to make this backpack a little more comfortable to use. There is a strap that can go around your waist. Maybe it would have been better if they made a sternum strap instead of a waist strap.
customer_reviews.author: G's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome it is!
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same backpack sold in the parks and exceptionally cheaper! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: K Emmert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, very soft and plush-like, and comfortable to wear. It doesn't hold much inside, but it's a really great accessory and gift for any Star Wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was very surprised how deep the backpack area s. It had so much stuff and he is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack almost 3 years ago. I will be buying another one to replace the one I have. On the old on the zipper wore out. It would zip then the zipper would come undone. Hopefully this new backpack will last me longer. The zipper started stop working right a year ago. Still an awesome backpack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this backpack is great. holds more than expected
customer_reviews.text: this backpack is great.holds more than expected. only problem is the straps dont stay adjusted but thats an easy fix with a safety pin.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wear it you must, smiles you will get.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 yr old nephew and he loves it. He's a huge Star Wars fan and this was too much of a no brainer. It was a little big for him and it looked like Yoda was attacking him more than getting a ride. He gets a lot of complements anytime he goes out wearing it. It doesn't have the a lot of storage but that's not why you buy something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Littlesquire

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the cutest thing you will ever see. Honestly, it looks so real!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Best gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for my boyfriend for our Disney trip! Yoda the backpack was a hit in Disney world. My boyfriend got a ton of complaints and the Jedi master got praised by a group of fanboys and fangirls!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fun and clever toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make a Luke Skywalker cosplay. Loved the look of it. It doesn't hold that much but that's not why I got it so it wasn't a concern of mine
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D.B.

customer_reviews.title: cute backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this backpack, not alot of space inside but looks cute and worked as part of my costume for Halloween
customer_reviews.author: Jay G

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: i love it! i can store my chrombook laptop inside the book bag. very cute and amazing gift. i have posted it in my instagram and everyone loved it 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Steve Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Yoda let down.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to order this as I'm a big Star Wars fan. But the item I received was less than stellar. Yoda's eyes are looking in opposite directions, the actual space in the backpack is very limited with no inside pockets. But, the biggest disappointment was that one of the straps was sewn on backward so it is twisted instead of being straight. I still like the idea of owning this item but I wish they would have had taken more pride in working on this project.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Flores

customer_reviews.title: Everyone sees it
customer_reviews.text: Never have to worry about not being seen on my motorcycle! only problem was the stitching on one of the straps fell apart. other than that its great!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look very much like Yoda
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is for a really big Star Wars fan, but it doesn't really look like Yoda. It's definitely more for an adult than a child because of it's size. Not very much room in the pouch for stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Charmedchick

customer_reviews.title: YODA!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t store a lot, but.... it’s Star Wars, it’s Yoda.... my kid loves it and I get compliments everywhere I go with it
customer_reviews.author: ryan reppert

customer_reviews.title: YODA WAS A HIT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Yoda as a gift for a family member but her critters have fallen in love with him. Now it’s a competition as to who gets there first. He is well made and well loved. He arrived promptly and I would order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Stormi

customer_reviews.title: He is so so cute although the eyes seem like they will get scratched up or torn up easily ...
customer_reviews.text: He is so so cute although the eyes seem like they will get scratched up or torn up easily and it is really big for a small kid (6yr old).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's super fun and
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loves it. It holds more than most stuffed animal backpacks do, but it still doesn't hold much. It's super fun for super fans, though it's not a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: alaskanchick

customer_reviews.title: Small, but awesome...much like Yoda himself.
customer_reviews.text: So yes...I am an adult with this backpack...because its awesome! It is on the small side. i cant use it for school, because a standard sized notebook or text book won't fit. However, it is great for a day pack. I have used for a carying things like water bottles, pencils and pads of paper (half sheet and smaller), and even golf supplies when I had to bike, and didn't want to ride with my whole golf bag. I just really enjoy it. It also gave me a great costume for halloween last year...I was Luke. : ) So, over all, it would be nice if it was bigger, but its still useful and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as the one sold at Disney!
customer_reviews.text: Exact same quality as the one at the parks for HALF the price. Very minimal storage, but it is perfect for a day at the park!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Yoda Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Loved the backpack when I saw some folks at the Comic Con had one. I tried to find a place at the convention if anyone was selling it but I was lucky to find it here at Amazon. And I actually bought 2 of them. One for me and one for my nephew. :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria Carter

customer_reviews.title: great quality, perfect for any Yoda lover
customer_reviews.text: So cute, great quality, perfect for any Yoda lover. I plan to use this on my next Disney vacation, as it has enough room for a wallet, camera and phone.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew. It is a cute backpack, but is mainly for decoration. I do not think this would be good for school, but very cool for overnights or just for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Dana T. / Jared T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, now i can have Yoda on my back when i ride my bike on the freeway.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: A lot of looks
customer_reviews.text: Love the back pack looks good when I am riding on the motorcycle and people point and stair. The only thing is check where it attaches to the hand on today mine ripped and almost lost it.
customer_reviews.author: aughe mcquown

customer_reviews.title: Yoda Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This Star Wars Yoda backpack is so adorable! I displayed Yoda in our family's Star Wars Movie Theme "Trunk or Treat" at my son's elementary school's Halloween event and the children loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Buy me you shall
customer_reviews.text: he is co cute (and creepy!) I got him as an xmas gift for my brother who loves Luke Skywalker and the compartment was a great size to hide another Star Wars related present! Now my brother wants to run through a swamp with this guy on his back!
customer_reviews.author: Empty Bows

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. The straps are suitable for an adult
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this for myself! (26 years old) Lol! I really like it. The straps are suitable for an adult. When I use the bag, it catches all the attentions! I can hear that people start to talk abour Star Wars! Very funny. Anyway, you cannot put everything in the bag, only the essential stuff. I think it is quite enough for me...
customer_reviews.author: Yagmur Sonmez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Yoda fan
customer_reviews.text: Saw this little guy @ Disney on the back on someone in front of me while waiting in line & fell in love with him. Purchased him as gift for someone who is a huge Yoda fan. He sits in his chair providing wisdom to all who pass his way. :-) BTW - he is also alot of fun to carry around as he is a sturdy back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: What a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Could not have found a more perfect Christmas gift for our 6 year old grandson. This was a perfect addition to an already huge Star Wars collection. He absolutely loved it!! A smaller version for young children would be ideal. Even after cinching up as far as we could go, it was still handing off him but he held on anyway. Thanks Amazon for the expedient shipping, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. I'm surprised as to how much it can hold!
customer_reviews.author: AT73

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was more storage space but he's just a little dude. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy this a Disneyland for $70. Can't believe I found this for half the price!! I'm so happy! It great quality and very durable. My friends 3 year old was playing with it like a doll and it still looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Pakpahan

customer_reviews.title: Master Yoda
customer_reviews.text: I saw a woman with a Yoda Buddy when I was in an airport. As soon as I got home I had to get one for my Grandson. We're holding it till Christmas but it's hard. I cannot wait for him to see it. I believe that Buddy is amost as big as the 4 yr old who will be wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stogsdill

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bag!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bag!! I have used this as a purse and as a carry on bag while traveling. I love it! Its also VERY spacious!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great pack this is...
customer_reviews.text: This little backpack has probably gotten more smiles and great comments than would have been expected. The pictures make it look bigger than it is, but it's nicely made and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Yodeler

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is so adorable! I get so many compliments when I wear ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is so adorable! I get so many compliments when I wear it! The quality if the backpack is really great as well, it definitely looks like yoda. If you're a Star Wars fan, I highly recommend purchasing one of these for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Thera Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Yoda On Your Back
customer_reviews.text: Oddly ugly, but works great. About the size of a large monkey on the back when worn.
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: her dad love it more Lol
customer_reviews.text: Got for my niece. her dad love it more Lol!
customer_reviews.author: tafsf

customer_reviews.title: ... a running bag to help motivate me to train like a Jedi Master
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a running bag to help motivate me to train like a Jedi Master. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth The Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over how adorable this Yoda backpack is! This is the perfect gift for that Star Wars fan in your life (even if that's yourself). I was surprised at how much you can actually put in it. I can fit a water bottle, my wallet, keys, phone, and phone charger with a little space remaining. Definitely bringing this little guy with me to Disneyland– and very happy I got this so much cheaper than the one they sell at the park!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Yoda
customer_reviews.text: The backpack came pretty quickly and looked just like the photos showed. But it's much smaller than I thought it would be. The photos show what looks like standard school text books inside, but believe me those won't fit. Truthfully, there's not a lot that would fit inside except maybe a bottle of hooch. It's pretty cool though and gives my wife the creeps. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: MonsterZero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seller!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is the BEST! Not much space but what he lacks in roominess, he makes up for in adorableness! Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it. He was Yoda for Halloween & wears this everywhere. Nice quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Thangbella

customer_reviews.title: Yoda, are you high?
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing the product, I found out the backpack was pretty good in size, but it could be a little bit larger at least. I also found out the eyes of Yoda were not straight like the one pictured. Instead, they were completely opposing making me ask if Yoda was high? I like this product because it reminds me of Yoda riding on Luke's back. That made me lol. I would have bought it for me, but I decided to by it for a much bigger Star Wars fan, my grandma!
customer_reviews.author: UghRochester

customer_reviews.title: ) She says it holds much more than she expected and it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend and she wears it often and of course, I will not be seen in public with her while she wears it :) She says it holds much more than she expected and it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bones

customer_reviews.title: Quirky gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my mother who is a bit quirky and whimsical and she thoroughly enjoyed it. It has not been used much, but it seemed fully functional at the time of giving. Great, clever product over all.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I absolutly love this! I was looking for a new purse
customer_reviews.text: I absolutly love this! I was looking for a new purse, but i didnt want to spend a fortune on it. Im a huge starwars fan and ass soon as i saw this, i had to have it. Its SO roomy. I can fit my wallet (which is pretty long) a bath and body works body spray. 2 pairs of sunglasses. and a couple other things. I love this so much. I get loads of compliments on it too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Bahner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a Starwars Fan !!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bag as a gift for my daughter who is a starwars fan. She was excited to receive it today. Excellent quality and amazing product. Highly recommend for any starwars fan!!
customer_reviews.author: Hemanta Badya

customer_reviews.title: Great, this is
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed this greatly. Don't expect to be able to fit a TON inside it but it still has enough room to do the trick. I've even fit a gallon of milk in it when coming back from the store. I use it when riding my motorcycle around and people always wave and laugh.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast.
customer_reviews.text: Wow all the fun compliments I received was well worth the price! SIKE i got bullied 10/10 would do it again

customer_reviews.title: ... and I have to say that this backpack is perfect!! I'm in love with this as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my mom because she forgot to buy it when we were in DisneyWorld and I have to say that this backpack is perfect!! I'm in love with this as well!!

customer_reviews.title: good for adults too.
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I am using it as a purse it amazes my how many adults love it. When ever I'm out people always comment on how cute it is.
customer_reviews.author: May L

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack for my 26 year old fiance for Christmas. He loves it! It's cute and fun! Who doesn't love a little Yoda! He actually uses it as a camera bag when we go hiking! Great for the Star Wars fan in your house!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyBoys08

customer_reviews.title: Comical
customer_reviews.text: This bag is more for fashion than practicality. The pocket is very small and doesn't hold much of anything, but it is fun to where and watch people's reactions. Get compliments on it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Same as Disney for much less
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is super cute. it does not hold much but it can fit a few things. I use this on my trips to Disney. even with my pass the one sold at the parks is way to expensive. This is exactly the same thing for way less money. Buy from here!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Love it. More backpack space than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Love it. More backpack space than I was expecting.. I can't wait to take it to disney.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I ran a half marathon wearing it. I had to alter the straps but it was great. Love my backpack.

product_meta.title: Comic Images Backpack Buddies Yoda Back Pack
product_meta.description:
Comic Images. Themed after your favorite characters. Our mission is to provide fun and comical wasy to entertain your children.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Comic Fans, rejoice. Comic Images has raised the bar for cute and cuddly plushies. Backpack Buddies are figural Backpacks themed to your favorite characters.
feature_bullets: Made using the highest quality materials
Soft, cuddly, and will keep your things secure
Adjustable straps and carry pouches make these "Buddies" great for young and old alike
Recreate the scene from "Empire Strikes Back" where Luke has to play "Jungle Taxi" to Yoda
Perfect as a gift for all Star Wars Fans
